channel.title: Tobu & Wholm — Motion (Remastered By Voltt)
channel.description:
Hey guys! Just released a remix of Tobu and Wholm's "Motion." It's a really beautiful track and that's why I decided to remix it. If you wanna hear the original track, click [here](https://soundcloud.com/7obu/motion).
My remix is up on soundcloud [here](https://soundcloud.com/volttmusic/tobu-wholm-motion-voltt).
I think I did a really great job layering the chords and stuff. Tell me what you guys think! Any feedback is welcome.
![Tobu motion remix|666x500](upload://ajIfqcPuqQFjkLKE5UTxZWfjAJS.jpg)
